alert.note: Alert for Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 3:46PM EST until March 11 at 10:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Highest north and west of I-84 and the higher elevations of Orange County NY. * WHERE...Portions of southern Connecticut, northeast New Jersey and southeast New York. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Passaic
